node.title: Specialists probe deaths of 4yo twins near Byron Bay as town grapples with 'unfathomable' loss
node.alt: Two police cars parked under trees, near a driveway.
node.description: Police from the arson squad are travelling to Goonengerry after the sisters died on the weekend in a tragedy locals are describing as "incomprehensible".
node.content:
["Officers from the NSW Police\u00a0arson squad are continuing to examine the property where twin four-year-old girls died in a house fire\u00a0west of\u00a0Byron Bay on the weekend.", "Emergency services were called to the scene at Goonengerry at about 4am yesterday, but the girls, who were asleep at the time of the fire, could not be revived.", "Police have established Strike Force Lilian to continue the\u00a0investigation\u00a0into their deaths.", "Specialist officers are travelling from Sydney to assist and an investigator from the NSW Rural Fire Service is also attending the scene.", "The area has been declared a crime scene and a police spokesperson said it was likely officers would be there all day.", "At this stage police believe a candle that was left burning on top of a piano in the room where the girls were sleeping caused smouldering and the release of toxic fumes.", "Police said it appeared smoke inhalation caused the girls' deaths, but they were working with the arson squad and detectives to confirm.", "However, police were pursuing a number of lines of inquiries to determine how the fire started.", "There appeared to be not much fire damage to the property, which is a single-storey home in the\u00a0Nunkeri multiple occupancy\u00a0community.", "", "
The girls died at the Goonengerry property.(ABC North Coast: Miranda Saunders)
", "
'Unfathomable' loss
", "Police have not released the names of the girls or identified any family members.", "But Byron Shire Mayor\u00a0Michael Lyon said both parents were involved in upcoming local government election campaigns and were widely known in the community.", "\"So many of us know the parents and the children,\" he said.", "Mr Lyon\u00a0said\u00a0the tight-knit Goonengerry community had been rocked by the tragedy.", "\"We are all absolutely devastated and still in a complete state of shock,\" he said.", "\"For all of us that are part of the community, it is just unfathomable.\"", "Tweed-Byron Police District Commander Dave Roptell said the girls\u00a0were visiting their father as part of\u00a0a joint custody arrangement."]
